Job Title: Software Development Engineer in Test ( SDET )
Job Description: What you'll be doing:     Designs and develops automated test cases for given business cases.     Deliver acceptance tests that match specs.     Act as a mission-critical member in the development of cutting-edge applications and services, as well as collaborating with other business units.     Share technical knowledge with existing team.     Participate in a small, experienced, energetic team on a rapid, agile development schedule.    What we're looking for:    Experience with C# and .Net Framework or Java for automation tests     Experience with utilizing Postman for API interaction     Experience with relational databases and ORM technologies     Experience with Git or a similar distributed version control system     Understanding of Service Oriented Architecture system or Microservice architecture     Experience with Agile development processes is a plus     Ability to work in a challenging, fast-paced agile environment     Desire and ability to work as part of a team     Experience with the following are a plus: C#, Java, .Net Core, Postman, T-SQL, Cassandra, Java, Kubernetes, AWS or GCP, Docker, GoLang
